channel.title: Black mesa won't load!!
channel.description:
For days, every time I try to open the game, It keeps on saying that the steam servers are too busy to work with the game :fffuuu: Busy with what? It's not an official game it's just a mod.
The first thing I was thinking of of doing is re installing Source SDK 2007 but I was afraid That I might lose more than black mesa.
anyone know what the hell is going on? :'(
